alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 9:27PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Collier, northwestern Hendry and western Glades Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 926 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Babcock Ranch to near Fort Myers. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Palmdale, Port La Belle, Felda, Ortona, Muse and Keri. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
